channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump has dropped a high-profile abortion case in Idaho. Here’s what that means

item.title: What does the Department of Education do - and can Trump dismantle it?

item.title: Denmark postal service to stop delivering letters
item.description: The decision will end 400 years of the company's letter service, and postboxes will disappear from June.

item.title: Women scale peak, retrieve photos and bag of dad who died 40 years ago
item.description: Guillermo Vieiro was 44 when he died in 1985 while descending Argentina's Tupungato lava dome, one of the highest peaks in the Americas.
